Mrkela: Zvezda mora da bude ta koja svake godine osvaja titulu
05 Nov 2019, 18:19 by Zile
Sportski direktor Crvene zvezde, Mitar Mrkela, optimista je pred sutrašnji duel sa Totenhemom.
Mrkela je u izjavi za Zvezda TV rekao da timovi koji dođu na stadion „Rajko Mitić“ nikada ne mogu da budu sigurni u pobedu.
– Igramo sa jednom od najboljih ekipa na svetu. Zadatak onih koji rade u Zvezdi je da budu bolji od drugih. Bilo ko da dođe na Marakanu ne može sa sigurnošću da tvrdi da će pobediti, zvao se on i Totenhem. Ovde se mnoge ekipe nisu dobro provele. Nadam se najboljem ishodu. Prošle godine je cilj bila grupna faza Lige šampiona, a ove sezone želimo dalje, da prezimimo u Evropi. Nadam se da ćemo to i ostvariti, rekao je Mrkela.
Zvezda ima samo jedan cilj, da bude bolja od drugih.
– Ko to ne shvata, ne može ni da radi u Zvezdi. Postavili smo ciljeve od samog početka, oni su visoki. Zvezda svake godine mora da bude ta koja osvaja titulu, a navijači očekuju i igru u Evropi, zaključio je Mrkela.
Meč Crvena zvezda – Totenhem na programu je u sredu od 21 čas.

Mrkela: The star must be the one who wins the title every year
05 Nov 2019, 17:19 by Zile
The Red Star sports director, Mitar Mrkela, is optimistic about tomorrow's match with Tottenham.
Mrkela said in a statement to Zvezda TV that teams that come to Rajko Mitic Stadium can never be sure of a win.
- We play with one of the best teams in the world. The job of those who work at the Star is to be better than others. Anyone who comes to Marakana cannot say for sure that he will win, his name was Tottenham. Many teams did not have a good time here. I hope for the best outcome. Last year, the goal was the group stage of the Champions League, and this season we want to continue to spend the winter in Europe. I hope we can make it happen, Mrkela said.
A star has only one goal, to be better than others.
- Who doesn't understand, can't even work at the Star. We set goals from the beginning, they are high. Every year, the star has to be the one to win the title, and fans expect a game in Europe, Mrkela concluded.
The Red Star - Tottenham match is on Wednesday at 9pm.
